fields.label: translate:: Type
fields.description: translate:: Optional media to display above the question.

semantics.label: translate:: Task description
semantics.default: translate:: Fill in the missing words
semantics.description: translate:: A guide telling the user how to answer this task.

field.label: translate:: Line of text
field.placeholder: translate:: Oslo is the capital of *Norway*.

important.description:
translate::
  • Blanks are added with an asterisk (*) in front and behind the correct word/phrase.
  • Alternative answers are separated with a forward slash (/).
  • You may add a textual tip, using a colon (:) in front of the tip.
important.example: translate:: H5P content may be edited using a *browser/web-browser:Something you use every day*.

fields.label: translate:: Define custom feedback for any score range
fields.description: translate:: Click the "Add range" button to add as many ranges as you need. Example: 0-20% Bad score, 21-91% Average Score, 91-100% Great Score!

fields.label: translate:: Feedback for defined score range

semantics.label: translate:: Text for "Not filled out" message
semantics.default: translate:: Please fill in all blanks to view solution

semantics.label: translate:: Text for "':ans' is correct" message
translate:: Text for "':ans' is wrong" message
translate:: Assistive technology label for solution
translate:: Assistive technology label for input field
semantics.description: translate:: Use @num and @total to replace current cloze number and total cloze number

semantics.label: translate:: Assistive technology label for saying an input has a tip tied to it
translate:: Behavioural settings.
semantics.description: translate:: These options will let you control how the task behaves.

fields.label: translate:: Automatically check answers after input
translate:: Case sensitive
fields.description: translate:: Makes sure the user input has to be exactly the same as the answer.

fields.label: translate:: Require all fields to be answered before the solution can be viewed
translate:: Put input fields on separate lines
translate:: Show confirmation dialog on "Check"
fields.description: translate:: This options is not compatible with the "Automatically check answers after input" option

fields.label: translate:: Accept minor spelling errors
fields.description: translate:: If activated, an answer will also count as correct with minor spelling errors (3-9 characters: 1 spelling error, more than 9 characters: 2 spelling errors)

fields.label: translate:: Body text
fields.default: translate:: Are you sure you wish to finish ?

fields.label: translate:: Body text
fields.default: translate:: Are you sure you wish to retry ?

semantics.label: translate:: Textual representation of the score bar for those using a readspeaker
semantics.default: translate:: You got :num out of :total points

semantics.label: translate:: Assistive technology description for "Check" button
semantics.default: translate:: Check the answers. The responses will be marked as correct, incorrect, or unanswered.

semantics.label: translate:: Assistive technology description for "Show Solution" button
semantics.default: translate:: Show the solution. The task will be marked with its correct solution.

semantics.label: translate:: Assistive technology description for "Retry" button
semantics.default: translate:: Retry the task. Reset all responses and start the task over again.

semantics.label: translate:: Assistive technology description for starting task
